author: Reuters Editorial
title: Space cadet: A Chinese father innovates to ward off coronavirus
description: As the spread of coronavirus eases in China, Cao Junjie and his family are making the most of the sunny days at a Shanghai amusement park - with one important twist.
content:
SHANGHAI (Reuters) - As the spread of coronavirus eases in China, Cao Junjie and his family are making the most of the sunny days at a Shanghai amusement park - with one important twist. 
Cao’s son is wearing an inflatable suit to protect him from the highly… [+1516 chars]
